text: Ítalo Anderson Duarte de Santana (born February 22, 1989 in Maceió), simply known as Ítalo, is a Brazilian footballer who plays as defender for Treze. ==Career statistics== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|State League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Conmebol !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals!!Apps!!Goals |- |rowspan=4 valign="center"|CRB |2010 |rowspan=2|Série C |2||0||17||1||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||19||1 |- |2011 |1||0||14||2||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||15||2 |- |2012 |Série B |6||0||12||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||18||0 |- !colspan="2"|Subtotal !9!!0!!43!!3!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!colspan="2"|—!!52!!3 |- |valign="center"|Central |2013 |Série D |10||0||24||2||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||34||2 |- |valign="center"|Operário Ferroviário |2014 |Paranaense |colspan="2"|—||3||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||3||0 |- |valign="center"|Campinense |2014 |Série D |8||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||8||0 |- |valign="center"|Maringá |2015 |Paranaense |colspan="2"|—||10||0||4||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||14||0 |- |valign="center"|Londrina |2015 |Série C |13||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||13||0 |- |valign="center"|Remo |2016 |Série C |6||0||9||0||1||0||colspan="2"|—||5||0||21||0 |- |valign="center"|Treze |2017 |Paraibano |colspan="2"|—||0||0||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||colspan="2"|—||0||0 |- !colspan="3"|Career total !46!!0!!89!!5!!5!!0!!0!!0!!5!!0!!145!!5 |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Association football defenders Category:Clube de Regatas Brasil players Category:Treze Futebol Clube players
